about.title: About Me
about.intro:
Hello, I am /Uzeyir/, an experienced /software/ developer in the front-end field. My expertise includes /React, Nextjs/, and user interface /UX, UI/ design. I help people with the knowledge and experience I have in this field. 
I can best support you by providing customized solutions based on your needs. Please contact me for more details and information about my services.

common.adage: If life is an experiment in a virtual universe...

1.title: # News Website
1.description: As one of my first projects, it helped me understand web technologies, content management, and data transfer. This project provided me with practical experience. I learned the basics of building and managing a website.

2.title: üìä Talent Analysis for Students
2.description: This project aimed to help students discover their talents. Students could input various skills and interests, simplifying their career selection process based on this information.

3.title: üìö BITurk ‚Äì Turkish Language Learning App
3.description: BITurk was a mobile and web application designed to help users learn the Turkish language. This project enhanced my experience in application development and designing interactive and engaging learning tools.

4.title: ‚åó Npm Library for Real-Time Data Transfer
4.description: This project focused on real-time data transfer, inspired by delays in my university's LMS system. I designed a simple library that could be easily integrated into LMS platforms to provide instant notifications and schedules.

5.title: üéØ Online Game with Social Features
5.description: This project allowed users to meet and play games together. I learned a lot about building real-time multiplayer systems and scalable online services.

6.title: üç™ 3D Cookie Cutter Generator
6.description: In this project, users could upload an image, and the system would detect the edges to create 3D-printable cookie cutter files. This project enhanced my image processing skills in a browser environment.

7.title: üåç 360 Degree Virtual Tour Web Application
7.description: I developed a web application using Three.js that allowed users to explore virtual environments in 360 degrees. This project deepened my experience with 3D technologies.

8.title: üè† Remote Home Control Application
8.description: This project focused on controlling home devices remotely using WiFi systems. I gained valuable experience in IoT systems, hardware integration, and real-time monitoring.
